title: Google Pixel phones have a few tricks to improve copy and paste — here’s how they work
content:
Being able to copy and paste text on your phone is vital to everyday usage. On Google Pixel, there are a few features that make the copy-and-paste process incredibly seamless. This guide explains how to copy and paste text on Google Pixel from just about any app and gives you a few copy-and-paste tips and tricks, too.

more…

The post Google Pixel phones have a few tricks to improve copy and paste — here’s how they work appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A core function of any smartphone is the ability to copy & paste. This guide will take you through how to copy/paste text on Google Pixel.
